page.title: 20Child's average school day
page.content:
continued In the afternoon the time is spent on project work, sports, swimming in the school pool in summer, sewing and reading. Infant and lower junior classes have a story read to them most afternoons. In break-times at school some of the children play in the field and some in the playground or they are all indoors if it is wet. They play cricket or football or play on the climbing-frame, play recorders or do gardening in the school garden. In the evenings most children had a cooked tea. They played on their bikes, watched T.V., played indoors or read in the evenings.
This information was collected and written by FILLEIGH C.P. SCHOOL (Headmaster J.L.Mortimer)
